item.title: An unmet need for data science training
item.description: The aim is to try to define the problem(s) a bit better and also a bit of a cry for help. I appreciate that none of this may be novel, but I needed to get it written down and out of my head. Learning R and about the related data science issues through the community has completely changed the way I…
